alert.note: Alert for Brown; Coleman; McCulloch; San Saba (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 21 at 7:43PM CDT until June 21 at 8:30PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN BROWN...SOUTHEASTERN COLEMAN...NORTHEASTERN MCCULLOCH AND NORTHWESTERN SAN SABA COUNTIES... At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located along the Colorado River near Winchell. A second storm was located along the Colorado River near Rockwood. Both storm are moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Elm Grove around 750 PM CDT. Skeeterville around 820 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Milburn, Locker, Mozelle, Whon, Us-283 Near The Mcculloch- Coleman County Line, Indian Creek and Shields. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
